attributes.action: Accept proof of vaccination against Covid from Mexico for international travel
attributes.additional_details:
This approval would help British families be together and also visitors will boost the UK economy.
 
The UK removed Mexico from the red list on 11-10-2021 but still they did not accept proof of vaccination from Mexico.
 
Some countries that were removed from the red list at the same time as Mexico, there vaccines were approved by the UK.
 
Please help assist millions of people affected by this situation, which includes myself as I am currently in Mexico wanting to come back to the UK.
attributes.background: I want people who have been vaccinated against Covid-19 in Mexico to be recognised, so all the British people in Mexico and the Mexican people can visit the UK without the isolation period affecting their visit, which currently is in place.
